commit 0cfd3f4cc4089009b2ef1085042a5540a05ea30c
Author: vlathgupta <viren.lathgupta@doordash.com>
Date:   Fri Aug 8 11:47:06 2025 -0700

    [CATCP-1215]: Create activity level skeleton for attribute extraction workflow

diff --git a/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivity.kt b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivity.kt

index 00000000000..787183d5031
--- /dev/null
+++ b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivity.kt
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+package com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities
+
+import com.uber.cadence.activity.ActivityMethod
+
+/**
+ * Activity to run model-based P0 attribute extraction.
+ * For now, keep the method empty at implementation level.
+ */
+interface ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivity {
+
+    @ActivityMethod(
+        scheduleToCloseTimeoutSeconds = SCHEDULE_TO_CLOSE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS,
+    )
+    fun extractP0Attributes()
+
+    companion object {
+        private const val SCHEDULE_TO_CLOSE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS = 60 // 60 seconds
+    }
+}
diff --git a/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/PostProcessExtractionResponseActivity.kt b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/PostProcessExtractionResponseActivity.kt
new file mode 100644

--- /dev/null
+++ b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/PostProcessExtractionResponseActivity.kt
@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+package com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities
+
+import com.uber.cadence.activity.ActivityMethod
+
+/**
+ * Activity to post-process the P0 attribute extraction response.
+ */
+interface PostProcessExtractionResponseActivity {
+
+    @ActivityMethod(
+        scheduleToCloseTimeoutSeconds = SCHEDULE_TO_CLOSE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS,
+    )
+    fun postProcessP0AttributeExtractionResponse()
+
+    companion object {
+        private const val SCHEDULE_TO_CLOSE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS = 60 // 60 seconds
+    }
+}
diff --git a/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/SkuEnrichmentActivity.kt b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/SkuEnrichmentActivity.kt

@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+package com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities
+
+import com.uber.cadence.activity.ActivityMethod
+
+/**
+ * Activity to enrich SKU after post-processing.
+ */
+interface SkuEnrichmentActivity {
+
+    @ActivityMethod(
+        scheduleToCloseTimeoutSeconds = SCHEDULE_TO_CLOSE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS,
+    )
+    fun enrichSKU()
+
+    companion object {
+        private const val SCHEDULE_TO_CLOSE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS = 60 // 60 seconds
+    }
+}
diff --git a/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivity.kt b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivity.kt
new file mode 100644

+++ b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivity.kt
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+package com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities
+
+import com.uber.cadence.activity.ActivityMethod
+
+/**
+ * Activity to retrieve taxonomy candidates for a given input.
+ * Keeping method signature minimal for now; will evolve with real params/return types.
+ */
+interface TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivity {
+
+    @ActivityMethod(
+        scheduleToCloseTimeoutSeconds = SCHEDULE_TO_CLOSE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS,
+    )
+    fun retrieveTaxonomyCandidates()
+
+    companion object {
+        private const val SCHEDULE_TO_CLOSE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS = 60 // 60 seconds
+    }
+}

diff --git a/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/workflow/AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflow.kt b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/workflow/AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflow.kt

+++ b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/workflow/AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflow.kt
@@ -1,13 +1,20 @@
 package com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.workflow
 
 import com.doordash.asgard.cadence.AsgardCadenceWorkflow
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivityImpl
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.PostProcessExtractionResponseActivityImpl
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.SkuEnrichmentActivityImpl
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivityImpl
 import com.google.inject.Inject
 
 class AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflow @Inject constructor() : AsgardCadenceWorkflow {
     override fun getTaskList(): String = getAttributeExtractionWorkflowTaskList()
 
     override fun getActivityImpls(): List<Any> = listOf(
-        // TODO: Add activity implementations when needed
+        TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivityImpl(),
+        ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivityImpl(),
+        PostProcessExtractionResponseActivityImpl(),
+        SkuEnrichmentActivityImpl(),
     )
 
     override fun getWorkflowClass(): Class<*> = AttributeExtractionWorkflowImpl::class.java
diff --git a/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/workflow/AttributeExtractionWorkflowImpl.kt b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/workflow/AttributeExtractionWorkflowImpl.kt
index 0613e2d54dd..9380fe66d28 100644

+++ b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/main/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/workflow/AttributeExtractionWorkflowImpl.kt
@@ -1,10 +1,40 @@
 package com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.workflow
 
 import com.doordash.asgard.logging.AsgardLogger
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivity
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.PostProcessExtractionResponseActivity
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.SkuEnrichmentActivity
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivity
+import com.uber.cadence.workflow.Workflow
 
 class AttributeExtractionWorkflowImpl : AttributeExtractionWorkflow {
     private val logger = AsgardLogger.logger {}
 
+    // Activity stubs
+    @Suppress("UnusedPrivateMember")
+    private val taxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivity =
+        Workflow.newActivityStub(
+            TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivity::class.java,
+        )
+
+    @Suppress("UnusedPrivateMember")
+    private val modelP0AttributeExtractionActivity =
+        Workflow.newActivityStub(
+            ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivity::class.java,
+        )
+
+    @Suppress("UnusedPrivateMember")
+    private val postProcessExtractionResponseActivity =
+        Workflow.newActivityStub(
+            PostProcessExtractionResponseActivity::class.java,
+        )
+
+    @Suppress("UnusedPrivateMember")
+    private val skuEnrichmentActivity =
+        Workflow.newActivityStub(
+            SkuEnrichmentActivity::class.java,
+        )
+
     override fun execute(params: AttributeExtractionWorkflowParams) {
         setLoggerContext(params)
         logger.info("AttributeExtraction workflow started.")
diff --git a/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/test/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivityImplTest.kt b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/test/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/activities/ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivityImplTest.kt

+package com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities
+
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivityImpl

diff --git a/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/test/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/workflow/AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflowTest.kt b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/test/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/workflow/AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflowTest.kt
new file mode 100644
index 00000000000..8148fce14f6
--- /dev/null
+++ b/services/nv-catalog-ml-infra/src/test/kotlin/com/doordash/nvcatalogmlinfra/cadence/workflow/AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflowTest.kt
@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+package com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.workflow
+
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivityImpl
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.PostProcessExtractionResponseActivityImpl
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.SkuEnrichmentActivityImpl
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivityImpl
+import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals
+import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach
+import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test
+
+class AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflowTest {
+
+    private lateinit var workflow: AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflow
+
+    @BeforeEach
+    fun setup() {
+        workflow = AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflow()
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    fun `get task list returns expected task list`() {
+        assertEquals(
+            getAttributeExtractionWorkflowTaskList(),
+            workflow.taskList,
+        )
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    fun `get activity impls returns expected list`() {
+        val impls = workflow.activityImpls
+        assertEquals(4, impls.size)
+        assertEquals(TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivityImpl::class.java, impls[0].javaClass)
+        assertEquals(ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivityImpl::class.java, impls[1].javaClass)
+        assertEquals(PostProcessExtractionResponseActivityImpl::class.java, impls[2].javaClass)
+        assertEquals(SkuEnrichmentActivityImpl::class.java, impls[3].javaClass)
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    fun `get workflow class returns expected class`() {
+        assertEquals(AttributeExtractionWorkflowImpl::class.java, workflow.workflowClass)
+    }
+}

+
+import com.uber.cadence.activity.ActivityMethod
+
+/**
+ * Activity to post-process the P0 attribute extraction response.
+ */
+interface PostProcessExtractionResponseActivity {
+
+    @ActivityMethod(
+        scheduleToCloseTimeoutSeconds = SCHEDULE_TO_CLOSE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS,
+    )
+    fun postProcessP0AttributeExtractionResponse()
+
+    companion object {
+        private const val SCHEDULE_TO_CLOSE_TIMEOUT_SECONDS = 60 // 60 seconds
+    }
+}

+package com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.workflow
+
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivityImpl
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.PostProcessExtractionResponseActivityImpl
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.SkuEnrichmentActivityImpl
+import com.doordash.nvcatalogmlinfra.cadence.activities.impl.TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivityImpl
+import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals
+import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach
+import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test
+
+class AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflowTest {
+
+    private lateinit var workflow: AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflow
+
+    @BeforeEach
+    fun setup() {
+        workflow = AttributeExtractionAsgardCadenceWorkflow()
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    fun `get task list returns expected task list`() {
+        assertEquals(
+            getAttributeExtractionWorkflowTaskList(),
+            workflow.taskList,
+        )
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    fun `get activity impls returns expected list`() {
+        val impls = workflow.activityImpls
+        assertEquals(4, impls.size)
+        assertEquals(TaxonomyCandidateRetrievalActivityImpl::class.java, impls[0].javaClass)
+        assertEquals(ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivityImpl::class.java, impls[1].javaClass)
+        assertEquals(PostProcessExtractionResponseActivityImpl::class.java, impls[2].javaClass)
+        assertEquals(SkuEnrichmentActivityImpl::class.java, impls[3].javaClass)
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    fun `get workflow class returns expected class`() {
+        assertEquals(AttributeExtractionWorkflowImpl::class.java, workflow.workflowClass)
+    }
+}

content.text:
## Code Review Summary

This commit creates a skeleton implementation for an attribute extraction workflow with 4 Cadence activities. The implementation follows good patterns but has some areas for improvement:

### ✅ **Strengths:**
- **Good separation of concerns**: Interface definitions separate from implementations
- **Consistent structure**: All activities follow the same pattern with proper timeout configuration
- **Comprehensive testing**: Each component has corresponding unit tests
- **Proper logging**: Uses AsgardLogger consistently
- **Clean integration**: Activities properly wired into the workflow

### ⚠️ **Areas for Improvement:**

1. **Hardcoded timeout values**: All activities use the same 60-second timeout
   - `ModelP0AttributeExtractionActivity.kt:17` and similar files
   - Consider making timeouts configurable or activity-specific

2. **No parameter validation**: Method signatures are empty placeholders
   - Activities will need proper input/output types when implemented

3. **Test coverage is minimal**: Tests only verify methods don't throw exceptions
   - Consider adding more comprehensive test scenarios

4. **Missing documentation**: Some activities lack clear purpose descriptions
   - `SkuEnrichmentActivity.kt:6` could be more specific about enrichment details

### 🔧 **Technical Observations:**
- **Consistent timeout**: 60 seconds across all activities may not be appropriate for different operation complexities
- **No error handling**: Implementations are no-ops, but future versions should include proper error handling
- **Workflow integration**: Activity stubs are created but suppressed as unused - this is appropriate for skeleton code

### 📋 **Recommendations:**
1. Consider making timeout values configurable via constants or configuration
2. Add TODO comments indicating what parameters/return types each activity will eventually need
3. Consider adding integration tests for the complete workflow once activities have real implementations

The skeleton structure is solid and provides a good foundation for implementing the actual attribute extraction functionality.
